definitions.definition: the salty water that covers a large part of the surface of the earth, or a large area of salty water, smaller than an ocean, that is partly or completely surrounded by land:
a large amount or number of something:
examples: The teacher looked down and saw a sea of smiling faces.

definitions.definition: (of a ship) to leave a port and start a journey:
examples: The boats will put (out) to sea on this evening's high tide.

definitions.definition: one of the large, flat areas on the moon that in the past were thought to be seas
